com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.refl

Interface MethodSelector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Formattable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MethodSelector.Default, MethodSelector.PreferExact, MethodSelector.PreferNarrower

    public interface MethodSelector
extends Formattable

    An interface representing an object that selects Methods from given ones.

    This interface is used to choose methods that are appropriate to invoke with given arguments.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MethodSelector.Default 
      static class  MethodSelector.PreferExact 
      static class  MethodSelector.PreferNarrower
      A method selector that selects "narrower" methods over "wider" ones.
      static class  MethodSelector.Utils

      Returns a composed MethodSelector that first applies this and then applies another.
      String describe()
      Returns a string that describes this object.
      default void formatTo(Formatter formatter, int flags, int width, int precision)
      Formats this object using the describe() method.
      List<Method> select(List<Method> methods, Object[] args)
      Selects methods that can be invoked with given args.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        List<Method> select(List<Method> methods,
                    Object[] args)

        Selects methods that can be invoked with given args.

        Parameters:
        methods - Methods from which returned methods are selected.
        args - Arguments to be passed to selected methods.
        Returns:
        Selected methods.

      • describe

        String describe()

        Returns a string that describes this object.

        Returns:
        A description of this object

      • andThen

        default MethodSelector andThen(MethodSelector another)

        Returns a composed MethodSelector that first applies this and then applies another.

        Parameters:
        another - The method selector to apply after this.
        Returns:
        The composed method selector

      • formatTo

        default void formatTo(Formatter formatter,
                      int flags,
